span.span: Defines events for a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `EventBuilder`始终与关联 `TypeBuilder` 。An `EventBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`. TypeBuilder. DefineEvent 方法会 `EventBuilder` 向客户端返回一个新的。The TypeBuilder.DefineEvent method will return a new `EventBuilder` to a client.

summary.span: 添加与该事件关联的“其他”方法之一。

span.span: Adds one of the "other" methods associated with this event.

summary.span: “其他”方法是与该事件关联的、除了“开”(on) 和“引发”(raise) 方法以外的方法。

span.span: "Other" methods are methods other than the "on" and "raise" methods associated with an event.

summary.span: 可以多次调用此函数，以添加一样多的“其他”方法。

span.span: This function can be called many times to add as many "other" methods.
